signatures.name: Chinese Prompt Override
signatures.description: Detects Chinese-language prompt injection attempting to override instructions (e.g., ignore instructions/rules/restrictions).

signatures.name: Spanish Instruction Override
signatures.description: Detects Spanish-language prompt injection attempting to disregard previous instructions.

signatures.name: French Instruction Override
signatures.description: Detects French-language prompt injection attempting to bypass instructions.

signatures.name: German Instruction Override
signatures.description: Detects German-language prompt injection attempting to override rules.

signatures.name: Japanese Instruction Override
signatures.description: Detects Japanese-language prompt injection attempting to ignore instructions/rules.

signatures.name: Korean Instruction Override
signatures.description: Detects Korean-language prompt injection attempting to bypass restrictions.

signatures.name: Russian Instruction Override
signatures.description: Detects Russian-language prompt injection attempting to disregard rules.

signatures.name: Arabic Instruction Override
signatures.description: Detects Arabic-language prompt injection attempting to override instructions.

signatures.name: XML Tag Injection - System
signatures.description: Detects XML/HTML-style system tag injection attempting to impersonate system-level prompts.

signatures.name: XML Tag Injection - Instruction
signatures.description: Detects XML/HTML-style instruction tags used to inject directives into prompts.

signatures.name: XML Tag Injection - Role Override
signatures.description: Detects XML/HTML role tags attempting to impersonate different conversation roles.

signatures.name: Markdown Injection - Hidden Instruction
signatures.description: Detects markdown comment syntax used to hide injection instructions that may not be visible in rendered output.

signatures.name: Markdown Injection - Invisible Text
signatures.description: Detects hidden div elements with display:none that may contain injected instructions invisible to users.

signatures.name: Code Block Escape - Triple Backtick
signatures.description: Detects code block escape attempts where injection follows immediately after a code fence closure.

signatures.name: Code Block Escape - Nested Fence
signatures.description: Detects nested code fence attempts that may break out of a code block context.

signatures.name: Homoglyph Attack - Cyrillic Latin Substitution
signatures.description: Detects mixed Cyrillic and Latin characters that may be used for homoglyph-based instruction confusion or evasion.

signatures.name: Homoglyph Attack - Full-Width Characters
signatures.description: Detects sequences of full-width Latin characters that may be used to bypass text filters while remaining visually similar to normal text.
